<h3 id="X34627">X(34627) = CENTER OF THE HR-ELLIPSE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC-X3 REFLECTIONS TO OUTER-GARCIA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 7*a^4-6*(b+c)*a^3-2*(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a^2+6*(b-c)*(b^2-c^2)*a-5*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(34627) = 2*X(1)-3*X(3545) = 5*X(2)-4*X(1385) = 7*X(4)-4*X(4301) = X(4)+2*X(5881) = 5*X(4)-2*X(7982) = 4*X(8)-X(6361) = 5*X(8)-2*X(12702) = X(8)+2*X(18525) = 4*X(10)-3*X(3524) = 3*X(40)-2*X(34638) = X(145)-3*X(3839) = X(145)-4*X(18480) = 6*X(165)-5*X(376) = 3*X(165)-5*X(3679) = 4*X(165)-5*X(5657)</b>
<p>
The center of the reciprocal HR-ellipse of these triangles is X(34628)</p>
<p>X(34627) lies on these lines:
{1,3545}, {2,355}, {4,519}, {8,30}, {10,3524}, {20,3654}, {40,4669}, {55,28461}, {80,3476}, {100,18519}, {104,16371}, {114,9884}, {119,10031}, {145,3656}, {149,18516}, {150,17079}, {165,376}, {381,952}, {517,3543}, {518,11180}, {528,16112}, {529,34700}, {535,34744}, {542,34715}, {546,5734}, {547,10246}, {549,5731}, {551,5071}, {553,9613}, {631,19875}, {958,21161}, {962,3830}, {1000,3586}, {1056,5727}, {1478,9897}, {1482,3845}, {1483,5066}, {1512,34716}, {1698,15709}, {1699,16191}, {2096,12247}, {2975,18518}, {3090,5882}, {3146,28198}, {3244,18492}, {3486,10056}, {3487,10950}, {3488,3748}, {3529,11362}, {3533,30389}, {3534,5690}, {3544,9624}, {3576,3828}, {3579,4678}, {3616,5055}, {3617,10304}, {3621,12699}, {3623,9955}, {3632,31673}, {3633,18483}, {3829,6941}, {3832,24680}, {3855,13464}, {3871,18761}, {3872,18528}, {3885,31937}, {3895,18540}, {3913,21669}, {4297,4745}, {4305,4995}, {4421,6906}, {4668,31730}, {4677,5691}, {4860,5434}, {4870,10590}, {5054,9780}, {5056,15178}, {5067,19883}, {5258,6876}, {5435,11545}, {5550,15699}, {5658,31140}, {5844,9812}, {5901,19709}, {6684,15698}, {6739,27721}, {6797,18419}, {6845,12607}, {6905,11194}, {6990,15888}, {7319,9669}, {7983,9880}, {7987,15719}, {7989,13607}, {7991,33703}, {8148,20053}, {9588,21735}, {9778,15681}, {9803,34698}, {9881,13172}, {10164,15715}, {10165,19876}, {10172,30392}, {10248,12101}, {10267,16858}, {10283,11737}, {10385,10572}, {10595,19925}, {10944,11238}, {11231,15721}, {11278,20014}, {11491,16370}, {11499,13587}, {11539,19877}, {12243,13178}, {12248,15863}, {13624,15708}, {14269,20050}, {15623,19251}, {15640,20070}, {15679,16116}, {15683,28160}, {15684,28174}, {15692,26446}, {16226,23841}, {17549,22758}, {17561,24987}, {18493,20057}, {18517,20060}, {19924,34673}, {20052,33697}, {26006,30844}, {28452,34605}</p>
<p>
X(34627) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3543, 31145}, {3830, 12645}, {4677, 5691}, {12245, 15682}, {15640, 20070}<br>
X(34627) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (2, 355), (20, 3654), (40, 4669), (145, 3656), (376, 3679), (944, 2), (962, 3830), (1482, 3845), (1483, 5066), (3241, 381), (3534, 5690), (3656, 18480), (4297, 4745), (5731, 5790), (7967, 5587), (7983, 9880), (9884, 114), (10031, 119), (11001, 40), (12243, 13178), (12245, 4677), (13172, 9881), (15682, 5691), (16116, 15679), (31162, 34648), (34605, 28452), (34631, 31162), (34632, 34718)<br>
X(34627) = anticomplement of X(3655)<br>
X(34627) = pole of the line {4926, 26275} wrt orthoptic circle of Steiner inellipse<br>
X(34627) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 34631, 31162), (8, 34632, 34718), (8, 34668, 34730), (145, 3839, 3656), (355, 944, 5818), (376, 3679, 5657), (381, 3241, 5603), (551, 5587, 5071), (3576, 3828, 15702), (3653, 9956, 2), (3656, 18480, 3839), (5071, 7967, 551), (9779, 10247, 5603), (30389, 31399, 3533), (31162, 34648, 4)<br>
</p>
